items.title: Sudanese eating charcoal and leaves to survive, aid agency warns
items.description: People are trekking under "blistering" heat to escape "horrific circumstances", the BBC is told.

items.title: Senior Russian general killed by car bomb in Moscow
items.description: Authorities confirm the general, Yaroslav Moskalik, was part of the Russian delegation for the 2015 Minsk agreements.

items.title: Pope Francis's funeral: A visual guide
items.description: The procession, the ancient rituals and the symbolic changes - how Pope Francis will make his final journey.

items.title: Ukraine may have to temporarily give up land for peace, Kyiv Mayor Klitschko tells BBC
items.description: Vitali Klitschko tells the BBC that although unfair, it could be a temporary solution to end the fighting.

items.title: Prosecutors to seek death penalty for Mangione as he heads to court
items.description: It comes ahead of the 26-year-old's plea hearing on federal charges in New York on Friday.
